HL7v2xStaticDef.EventDesc: HL7 Version 2.5.1 Implementation Guide: Laboratory Results Interface for US Realm, Release 1

ConformanceStatement.EnglishDescription: Specimen (Specimen Group) SHALL be present in at least one occurrence of one Order_Observation Group.
MSH.21.3 (Universal ID) of an occurrence of MSH.21 (Message Profile Identifier) SHALL contain the value " 2.16.840.1.113883.9.11"
MSH.21.1 (Entity Identifier) of an occurrence of MSH.21 (Message Profile Identifier) SHALL be valued with 'PHLabReport-Ack' OR 'PHLabReport-NoAck' OR 'PHLabReport-Batch'
MSH.1 (Field Separator) SHALL contain the constant value '|'.
MSH.2 (Encoding Characters) SHALL contain the constant value '^~\&#'.
IF HD.3(Universal ID type) value is "ISO", SHALL be a valid ISO OID format.
IF HD.3(Universal ID type) value is "CLIA", SHALL be a valid CLIA identifier format
IF element is MSH-4.3 (Universal ID type) , then HD.3 (Universal ID type) SHALL contain the value "ISO" OR "CLIA", ELSE HD.3 (Universal ID type) SHALL contain the value "ISO"
IF HD.3(Universal ID type) value is "ISO", SHALL be a valid ISO OID format.
IF HD.3(Universal ID type) value is "CLIA", SHALL be a valid CLIA identifier format
IF element is MSH-4.3 (Universal ID type) , then HD.3 (Universal ID type) SHALL contain the value "ISO" OR "CLIA", ELSE HD.3 (Universal ID type) SHALL contain the value "ISO"
IF HD.3(Universal ID type) value is "ISO", SHALL be a valid ISO OID format.
IF HD.3(Universal ID type) value is "CLIA", SHALL be a valid CLIA identifier format
IF element is MSH-4.3 (Universal ID type) , then HD.3 (Universal ID type) SHALL contain the value "ISO" OR "CLIA", ELSE HD.3 (Universal ID type) SHALL contain the value "ISO"
IF HD.3(Universal ID type) value is "ISO", SHALL be a valid ISO OID format.
IF HD.3(Universal ID type) value is "CLIA", SHALL be a valid CLIA identifier format
IF element is MSH-4.3 (Universal ID type) , then HD.3 (Universal ID type) SHALL contain the value "ISO" OR "CLIA", ELSE HD.3 (Universal ID type) SHALL contain the value "ISO"
MSH.7 (Date/Time Of Message) SHALL follow the format YYYYMMDDHHMMSS[.S[S[S[S]]]]+/-ZZZZ
MSH.9.1 SHALL contain the constant value 'ORU'
MSH.9.2 (Trigger Event) SHALL contain the constant value 'R01'
MSH.9.3 (Message Structure) SHALL contain the constant value 'ORU_R01'
MSH.12.1 (Version ID) SHALL contain the constant value '2.5.1'.

Predicate.EnglishDescription: If the first component (Entity Identifier) of one occurrence of MSH-21 (Message Profile Identifier) is 'PHLabReport-Ack'.

ConformanceStatement.EnglishDescription: MSH.15 (Accept Acknowledgment Type) SHALL contain the constant value 'AL' IF any occurrence of MSH.21.1 (Entity Identifier) is 'PHLabReport-Ack' , ELSE, if valued, SHALL contain the constant value 'NE'.

Predicate.EnglishDescription: If the first component (Entity Identifier) of one occurrence of MSH-21 (Message Profile Identifier) is 'PHLabReport-Ack'.

ConformanceStatement.EnglishDescription: MSH.16 (Application Acknowledgement Type) SHALL contain the constant value 'AL', 'NE', 'ER', or 'SU' ,'SU',IF any occurrence of MSH.21.1 (Entity Identifier) is 'PHLabReport-Ack', ELSE, if valued, SHALL contain the constant value 'NE' .
EI.3 (Universal ID) SHALL be valued with an ISO-compliant OID.
EI.4 (Universal ID Type) SHALL contain the value 'ISO' .

Predicate.EnglishDescription: If XON.10 ( ID Number) is not valued.
If XON.10 ( ID Number) is valued.

ConformanceStatement.EnglishDescription: IF HD.3(Universal ID type) value is "ISO", SHALL be a valid ISO OID format.
IF HD.3(Universal ID type) value is "CLIA", SHALL be a valid CLIA identifier format
IF element is MSH-4.3 (Universal ID type) , then HD.3 (Universal ID type) SHALL contain the value "ISO" OR "CLIA", ELSE HD.3 (Universal ID type) SHALL contain the value "ISO"

Predicate.EnglishDescription: If XON.10 ( ID Number) is valued.

Field.Name: Software Certified Version or Release Number

ConformanceStatement.EnglishDescription: SFT.6 (Software Install Date) SHALL follow the format YYYY[MM[DD[HH[MM[SS[.S[S[S[S]]]]]]]]][+/-ZZZZ]
If PID-7 (Date/Time of Birth) is not valued, then an OBX segment associated with the SPM segment SHALL be present to report patient age at specimen collection.
PID.1 (Set ID - PID) SHALL contain the constant value '1'.
IF HD.3(Universal ID type) value is "ISO", SHALL be a valid ISO OID format.
IF HD.3(Universal ID type) value is "CLIA", SHALL be a valid CLIA identifier format
IF element is MSH-4.3 (Universal ID type) , then HD.3 (Universal ID type) SHALL contain the value "ISO" OR "CLIA", ELSE HD.3 (Universal ID type) SHALL contain the value "ISO"
IF HD.3(Universal ID type) value is "ISO", SHALL be a valid ISO OID format.
IF HD.3(Universal ID type) value is "CLIA", SHALL be a valid CLIA identifier format
IF element is MSH-4.3 (Universal ID type) , then HD.3 (Universal ID type) SHALL contain the value "ISO" OR "CLIA", ELSE HD.3 (Universal ID type) SHALL contain the value "ISO"

Component.Name: Second and Further Given Names or Initials Thereof
Second and Further Given Names or Initials Thereof

ConformanceStatement.EnglishDescription: If valued, PID 6.7 (Name Type Code) SHALL contain the constant value 'M'.
If valued, PID-7 (Date/Time of Birth) SHALL follow the format YYYY[MM[DD[HH[MM[SS[.S[S[S[S]]]]]]]]][+/-ZZZZ]

Component.Name: Second and Further Given Names or Initials Thereof

ConformanceStatement.EnglishDescription: IF CWE.3 (Name of Coding System) value is "LN", SHALL be a valid LOINC code identifier format.
IF CWE.6 (Name of AlternateCoding System) value is "LN", SHALL be a valid LOINC code identifier format.

Predicate.EnglishDescription: If CWE.1 (Identifier) AND CWE.4 (alternate identifier) are not valued.

Second Alternate Coding System Version ID
Second Alternate Value Set Version ID

ConformanceStatement.EnglishDescription: XAD.4 (State or Province) SHALL use the FIPS 5-2 two letter alphabetic codes.
XAD.5 (Zip or Postal Code) SHALL be formatted as 99999[-9999] for US Zip or ZIP +4 codes or as A9A9A9 for Canadian postal codes.
XAD.9 (County/Parish Code) SHALL be formatted as 99999

If XTN.4 (Email Address) is not valued.

ConformanceStatement.EnglishDescription: PID.29 (Patient Death Date and Time) SHALL follow the format YYYY[MM[DD[HH[MM[SS[.S[S[S[S]]]]]]]]][+/-ZZZZ]
PID.33 (Last Update Date/Time) SHALL follow the format YYYY[MM[DD[HH[MM[SS[.S[S[S[S]]]]]]]]][+/-ZZZZ]

ConformanceStatement.EnglishDescription: IF HD.3(Universal ID type) value is "ISO", SHALL be a valid ISO OID format.
IF HD.3(Universal ID type) value is "CLIA", SHALL be a valid CLIA identifier format
IF element is MSH-4.3 (Universal ID type) , then HD.3 (Universal ID type) SHALL contain the value "ISO" OR "CLIA", ELSE HD.3 (Universal ID type) SHALL contain the value "ISO"

Predicate.EnglishDescription: If OBR.25 (Result Status) is valued "A", "C", "F", "P", or "R".

ConformanceStatement.EnglishDescription: OBX.8 (Abnormal Flags) Must be valued IF OBX.5(Observation Value) is empty AND OBX.11 (Observation Result Status) is not valued 'X'
OBX.5(Observation Value) Must be valued IF OBX.8 (Abnormal Flags) is empty AND OBX.11 (Observation Result Status) is not valued 'X'
OBX.1 (Set ID - OBX) SHALL be valued sequentially starting with the value '1' within a given Order Observation Group (OBX following the OBR).

IF CWE.6 (Name of AlternateCoding System) value is "LN", SHALL be a valid LOINC code identifier format.

Predicate.EnglishDescription: If there are multiple OBX segments associated with the same OBR segment that have the same OBX-3 values for (OBX-3.1 and OBX-3.3) or (OBX-3.4 and OBX-3.6).

ConformanceStatement.EnglishDescription: If valued, SN.3 (Separator/Suffix) SHALL contain the value "-" or "+" or "/" or "." or ":"
If valued, SN.1 (Comparator) SHALL contain the value ">" or "<" or ">=" or "<=" or "=" or "<>"
When OBX.2 = CWE : IF OBX.5.4 is present, OBX.5.6 SHALL be present. If OBX.5.4 is empty, OBX.5.6 SHALL be empty.

Predicate.EnglishDescription: If OBX.2 (Value Type) is valued 'NM' , 'SN' AND OBX.11 is not valued 'X'.

IF CWE.6 (Name of AlternateCoding System) value is "LN", SHALL be a valid LOINC code identifier format.

Predicate.EnglishDescription: If CWE.1 (Identifier) AND CWE.4 (alternate identifier) are not valued.

SubComponent.Name: Second Name of Alternate Coding System
Second Alternate Coding System Version ID
Second Alternate Value Set Version ID

ConformanceStatement.EnglishDescription: SPM.17.1 (Range Start Date/Time) SHALL be identical to OBR.7 (Observation Date/Time) value within the same Order_Observation Group.
SPM-17.1 (Range Start Date/Time) SHALL follow the format YYYYMMDD[HH[MM[SS[.S[S[S[S]]]]]]][+/-ZZZZ] OR contain the value "0000"" when the collection date/time is unknown.
SPM.17.2 (Range End Date/Time) SHALL be identical to OBR.8 (Observation End Date/Time) value within the same Order_Observation Group.
SPM.17.2 (Range End Date/Time) SHALL follow the format YYYYMMDD[HH[MM[SS[.S[S[S[S]]]]]]][+/-ZZZZ] OR contain the value "0000".
SPM.18 (Specimen Received Date/Time) SHALL follow the format YYYYMMDD[HH[MM[SS[.S[S[S[S]]]]]]][+/-ZZZZ]
IF CWE.3 (Name of Coding System) value is "LN", SHALL be a valid LOINC code identifier format.
IF CWE.6 (Name of AlternateCoding System) value is "LN", SHALL be a valid LOINC code identifier format.

Predicate.EnglishDescription: If CWE.1 (Identifier) AND CWE.4 (alternate identifier) are not valued.

Component.Name: Second Name of Alternate Coding System
Second Alternate Coding System Version ID
Second Alternate Value Set Version ID

ConformanceStatement.EnglishDescription: OBX.8 (Abnormal Flags) Must be valued IF OBX.5(Observation Value) is empty AND OBX.11 (Observation Result Status) is not valued 'X'
OBX.5(Observation Value) Must be valued IF OBX.8 (Abnormal Flags) is empty AND OBX.11 (Observation Result Status) is not valued 'X'
OBX.1 (Set ID - OBX) SHALL be valued sequentially starting with the value '1' within a given Specimen Group (OBX following the SPM).
IF CWE.3 (Name of Coding System) value is "LN", SHALL be a valid LOINC code identifier format.
IF CWE.6 (Name of AlternateCoding System) value is "LN", SHALL be a valid LOINC code identifier format.

Predicate.EnglishDescription: If CWE.1 (Identifier) AND CWE.4 (alternate identifier) are not valued.

Component.Name: Second Name of Alternate Coding System
Second Alternate Coding System Version ID
Second Alternate Value Set Version ID

ConformanceStatement.EnglishDescription: If valued, SN.3 (Separator/Suffix) SHALL contain the value "-" or "+" or "/" or "." or ":"
If valued, SN.1 (Comparator) SHALL contain the value ">" or "<" or ">=" or "<=" or "=" or "<>"
When OBX.2 = CWE : IF OBX.5.4 is present, OBX.5.6 SHALL be present. If OBX.5.4 is empty, OBX.5.6 SHALL be empty.

Predicate.EnglishDescription: If OBX.2 (Value Type) is valued 'NM' , 'SN' AND OBX.11 is not valued 'X'.

ConformanceStatement.EnglishDescription: IF CWE.3 (Name of Coding System) value is "LN", SHALL be a valid LOINC code identifier format.
IF CWE.6 (Name of AlternateCoding System) value is "LN", SHALL be a valid LOINC code identifier format.

Predicate.EnglishDescription: If CWE.1 (Identifier) AND CWE.4 (alternate identifier) are not valued.

ConformanceStatement.EnglishDescription: OBX-14 (Date/Time of the Observation) SHALL follow the format YYYYMMDD[HH[MM[SS[.S[S[S[S]]]]]]][+/-ZZZZ] OR contain the value "0000"" when the collection date/time is unknown.

Second Alternate Value Set Version ID

ConformanceStatement.EnglishDescription: OBX.19 (Date/Time of the Analysis) SHALL follow the format YYYY[MM[DD[HH[MM[SS[.S[S[S[S]]]]]]]]][+/-ZZZZ]

Predicate.EnglishDescription: If XON.10 ( ID Number) is not valued.
If XON.10 ( ID Number) is valued.

ConformanceStatement.EnglishDescription: IF HD.3(Universal ID type) value is "ISO", SHALL be a valid ISO OID format.
IF HD.3(Universal ID type) value is "CLIA", SHALL be a valid CLIA identifier format
IF element is MSH-4.3 (Universal ID type) , then HD.3 (Universal ID type) SHALL contain the value "ISO" OR "CLIA", ELSE HD.3 (Universal ID type) SHALL contain the value "ISO"

Predicate.EnglishDescription: If XON.10 ( ID Number) is valued.

ConformanceStatement.EnglishDescription: XAD.4 (State or Province) SHALL use the FIPS 5-2 two letter alphabetic codes.
XAD.5 (Zip or Postal Code) SHALL be formatted as 99999[-9999] for US Zip or ZIP +4 codes or as A9A9A9 for Canadian postal codes.
XAD.9 (County/Parish Code) SHALL be formatted as 99999

Component.Name: Second and Further Given Names or Initials Thereof

ConformanceStatement.EnglishDescription: IF HD.3(Universal ID type) value is "ISO", SHALL be a valid ISO OID format.
IF HD.3(Universal ID type) value is "CLIA", SHALL be a valid CLIA identifier format
IF element is MSH-4.3 (Universal ID type) , then HD.3 (Universal ID type) SHALL contain the value "ISO" OR "CLIA", ELSE HD.3 (Universal ID type) SHALL contain the value "ISO"
IF HD.3(Universal ID type) value is "ISO", SHALL be a valid ISO OID format.
IF HD.3(Universal ID type) value is "CLIA", SHALL be a valid CLIA identifier format
IF element is MSH-4.3 (Universal ID type) , then HD.3 (Universal ID type) SHALL contain the value "ISO" OR "CLIA", ELSE HD.3 (Universal ID type) SHALL contain the value "ISO"
